alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Hall; Hamilton; Merrick; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 22 at 12:01AM CDT until April 22 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN YORK...HAMILTON...NORTHWESTERN FILLMORE... SOUTHWESTERN MERRICK AND HALL COUNTIES... At 1200 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cairo to near Phillips to near Aurora to near Lushton, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Aurora around 1210 AM CDT. Henderson and Hampton around 1215 AM CDT. Chapman around 1220 AM CDT. Marquette around 1225 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 303 and 346. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
